text: Scott Baio Sexual Assault Case D. A. Believes Nicole Eggert... But, Baio Won't Be Prosecuted D. A. Believes Nicole Eggert, But Scott Baio Won't be Prosecuted for Sexual Assault EXCLUSIVE Scott Baio will not be prosecuted for allegedly sexually assaulting Nicole Eggert during the run of ` ` Charles in Charge,'' but we've learned the D. A. found her credible. Sources familiar with the case tell us on Wednesday Nicole met the L. A. County Deputy D. A., who is reviewing the case. Our sources say the D. A. found Nicole's allegations ` ` credible.'' As we reported, Eggert claimed Baio repeatedly molested her between ages 14 and
